Build Strength.goal: My fitness goal is to build strength and muscle mass by mixing upper and lower body strength workouts. A secondary goal is to build and maintain cardio endurance by taking medium and hard cycling classes. Every now and then I need a day to rest and do an easy workout for recovery. I do not like barre or pilates for strength workouts. Even if these workouts are suggested they should be ignored.

Run 5K.goal: I want to go from couch to 5k in the next month.
